message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $100. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  I'm really interested but $100 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with right now. Would you be willing to come down to $90?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $95. What do you think?
